introduction: With a range of built-in and extensible Modes, AI IDE BAS lets you plan, architect, code, debug and boost your productivity like never before.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.
chooseProvider: To do its magic, AI IDE BAS needs an API key.
startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.title: Help Improve AI IDE BAS
telemetry.anonymousTelemetry: Send anonymous error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. No code, prompts, or personal information is ever sent (unless you connect to AI IDE BAS Cloud). See our <privacyLink>privacy policy</privacyLink> for more details.
telemetry.changeSettings: You can always change this at the bottom of the <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>

buttons.aiIdeBasVideo: AI IDE BAS - AI Agent for Analysts

cloudCta.title: AI IDE BAS: Your AI assistant for analytics
cloudCta.desc: Generate documentation, write requirements and project artifacts much faster with AI.

features.bonus: Welcome bonus. Get free DeepSeek tokens right after sign up.
features.productionArtifacts: Generate real artifacts tailored to your development processes.
features.inviteFriends: Invite friends. Increase your bonus balance for each invite and collaborate.
features.googleSignIn: Sign in with Google. Fast start without passwords.
features.workAnywhere: Work from anywhere. Create cloud projects and share results with teammates.
